channel.title: Comments on: January Top 10 – The Months Most Inspiring Designs

item.title: By: Jim Ramsden
item.dc:creator: Jim Ramsden
item.description: Thanks Rafi. Its always nice to hear from the regular users. I redesigned the site with them in mind.
item.content:encoded: Thanks Rafi. Its always nice to hear from the regular users. I redesigned the site with them in mind.

item.title: By: Rafi
item.dc:creator: Rafi
item.description: Hey, I like your new website design as well as the top 10 collection. I have been a regular on DF. Thanks for the wonderful collection. Keep up the good work.
item.content:encoded: Hey, I like your new website design as well as the top 10 collection. I have been a regular on DF. Thanks for the wonderful collection. Keep up the good work.
